name: installer-configs
description: Configuration files for the UBports Installer.

scripts.validate: npm run validate:index && npm run validate:aliases && npm run validate:devices
scripts.v2:validate: npx ajv-cli -s v2/schema/device.schema.yml -r "v2/schema/*.schema.yml" -d "v2/data/devices/[a-zA-Z]*.yml" && npx ajv-cli -s v2/schema/index.schema.yml -r "v2/schema/*.schema.yml" -d "v2/data/index.yml" && npx ajv-cli -s v2/schema/aliases.schema.yml -d "v2/data/aliases.yml"

author: Jan Sprinz <jan@ubports.com>
